Description:
x 3 Improvement Notice served,

1) You have failed to ensure that the exposure of your employees to a substance hazardous to health, namely welding fume during welding of stainless steel is either prevented or where this is not reasonably practicable, adequately controlled in that there is not suitable and sufficient provision of local exhaust ventilation (LEV) equipment for use during welding activities undertaken on your premises.

2) You have failed to ensure that your Nederman portable Local Exhaust Ventilation (LEV) system provided to control exposure to substances hazardous to health, namely welding fume has been thoroughly examined and tested within the previous 14 months by a competent person.

3) You have failed to make and give effect to such arrangements as are appropriate for the effective planning, organisation, control, monitoring and review of the preventive and protective measures for managing watermix metalworking fluid quality to control dermatological risks from exposure to water-mix metalworking fluid used in your cutting processes.
